interface.name: XDragSourceProtocolListener
interface.javadoc:
Called when a reply from the current drop target is received.
action is the drop action selected by the drop target

Called when a reply from the current drop target is received.
action the drop action selected by the drop target
x the x coordinate of the pointer location in screen coordinates for the reply
y the x coordinate of the pointer location in screen coordinates for the reply

Called when a reply from the current drop target is received.
action the drop action selected by the drop target
x the x coordinate of the pointer location in screen coordinates for the reply
y the x coordinate of the pointer location in screen coordinates for the reply
modifiers the keyboard modifiers state for the reply
Called when the current drop target signals that the drag-and-drop operation is finished.

Called when the current drop target signals that the drag-and-drop operation is finished.
success true if the drop target successfully performed the drop action

Called when the current drop target signals that the drag-and-drop operation is finished.
action the drop action performed by the drop target
success true if the drop target successfully performed the drop action

Called when the current drop target signals that the drag-and-drop operation is finished.
action the drop action performed by the drop target
success true if the drop target successfully performed the drop action
x the x coordinate of the pointer location in screen coordinates for the signal
y the x coordinate of the pointer location in screen coordinates for the signal

Terminates the current drag-and-drop operation (if any) and performs the necessary cleanup.
time the time stamp of the event that triggered drag termination or XlibWrapper.CurrentTime
